texts: How do audit practices support security compliance?

This course provides an in-depth look at compliance frameworks, regulatory standards, and audit practices for securing enterprise environments. Duration: 2 hrs 12 mins. Learners: 29. Available in SB4A since 28 Jan 2023.
What are the key compliance KPIs in this course?

This course explores the strategic goals and key performance indicators (KPIs) essential for achieving and maintaining security compliance. Duration: 30 mins. Learners: 1. Available in SB4A since 14 Jan 2024.
How can organizations ensure continuous compliance?

This course explains how to establish and operate a Security and Compliance Center, focusing on real-time monitoring, incident response, and continuous compliance. Duration: 12 mins. Learners: 4. Available in SB4A since 24 Mar 2024.
What regulatory standards are discussed in this course?

An overview of the various security measures and options available in IBM Cloud, including best practices for implementing robust cloud security. Duration: 12 mins. Learners: 61. Available in SB4A since 28 Aug 2022.
Explain the process of managing compliance services in IBM Cloud.

This course details the implementation and management of IBM Cloud Security Services, with a focus on protecting cloud resources and data. Duration: 30 mins. Learners: 75. Available in SB4A since 14 Jan 2024.
